item.title: Todo list
item.description: As with all projects of mine, there is a list of things which I want to do with it when I find the time to do so. This is said list Automate build process to occur daily - So in its current iteration my site is built by running hugo -t risotto and then committing any changes to the public submodule. It is then auto-built using GitHub pages. In an ideal world, this would all happen on a daily basis automatically, and this will be possible through the use of GitHub actions.
